Key Arguments: The proposed powers are unnecessary as digital platforms already have records of misinformation and disinformation.
The ACMA's ability to enforce industry standards could lead to censorship and suppression of free speech.
The government and mainstream media, which are exempt from the Bill, have themselves spread misinformation, particularly regarding COVID-19.
The Bill could lead to a lack of accountability for the government and mainstream media.
The Bill's approach resembles censorship practices in authoritarian regimes like China.
Notable Quotes: So basically ACMA could end up censoring the whole system the same way China does.
Treating everyone like babies and being a nanny state is the same as communism.
All this says is that anything that goes against the government narrative will be removed with no justification or chance to prove it is actually correct and true.
